title: Can Zombie Ryze atleast get a chase animation like Brand?
body: We lost the rotting-ness, alteast make it more then juts Soul Stealer Ryze that is called something else.

replies.body: Doesn't the chase animation go through fog of war?  As in, if an enemy is hiding in a bush, and Zombie Brand is running towards it, it'll switch to the chasing animation?  If so, I can understand them not wanting to implement this into any more champions.

It's client side. If you are in a brush and you have vision of Brand and Brand doesn't have vision of you, you will see him do the chase animation, the Brand player won't see anything, it will still do the normal walking animation on his screen. Don't know how this stupid myth spread. For the footprints, they only show if you have vision of Brand.
Thanks for correcting me there.  Now I know a little more about the game, and won't spread misinformation further.
Yeah I think there was issues with the footsteps on the skin before too
